Down | 0–1 months | Tariff pass-through into consumer prices accelerates inflation and tightens financial conditions, raising real yields and risking a regime tilt away from levered cyclicals | What to watch: tariff milestones and pass-through timing into vehicle pricing, plus the big‑bill debt trajectory and Medicaid/spending dynamics | 65%(WTNT85IPR)(Scraped Source 2)(Scraped Source 4)
Down | 3–6 months | EV profitability regime remains challenging with persistent EV losses delaying earnings visibility, potentially widening discount-rate and risk premia pressures on cyclicals | What to watch: Ford EV margin trajectory and ROIC, EV ramp costs, and the pace of profitability normalization | 50%(22PL3Q360)(W2622L6WW)
